title: Exquisite Floral Cascade Haaram with Matching Jhumkas
materials: precision-cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ). Expertly crafted with Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance and shine.
features: This stunning set features a unique cascade design with intricate floral and leaf motifs meticulously rendered in both rose and white gold. The necklace presents a graduated design that sits beautifully on the neckline. The matching Jhumkas echo the necklace's floral pattern, creating a cohesive and elegant bridal look. The openwork filigree detailing showcases exceptional craftsmanship and light play.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. The elegant design also makes it suitable for formal parties and upscale events.
description: This Haaram set offers a modern twist on traditional South Indian jewelry. The two-tone gold design provides versatility, allowing it to complement both traditional and contemporary attire. The meticulous craftsmanship and high-quality CZ stones ensure lasting brilliance and a luxurious feel. This statement piece is sure to make you the center of attention and become a cherished heirloom.
